subject: You have done a UPI txn. Check details!
message:
HDFC BANK

Dear Customer,

Rs. {{amount}} has been debited from account {{maskedAccount}} to VPA {{source}} on {{transactionDate}}.

Your UPI transaction reference number is {{referenceId}}.

If you did not authorize this transaction, please report it immediately by calling 18002586161 Or SMS BLOCK UPI to 7308080808.

Warm Regards,
HDFC Bank

Stay safe - there is no such thing as a digital arrest.

© HDFC Bank

subject: View: Account update for your HDFC Bank A/c
message:
HDFC BANK

Dear Customer,

Rs. {{amount}} is successfully credited to your account {{maskedAccount}} by {{source}} on {{transactionDate}}.

Your transaction reference number is {{referenceId}}.

Thank you for banking with us.

Warm Regards,
HDFC Bank

Stay safe - there is no such thing as a digital arrest.

© HDFC Bank

subject: Low Balance Alert for Account {{accountId}}
message:
Dear {{customerName}},

Your account {{accountId}} has a low balance of ₹{{currentBalance}}. The minimum required balance is ₹{{threshold}}.

Please deposit funds to avoid penalties.

Thank you,
Your Bank

subject: Card Expiry Reminder
message: Dear {{customerName}}, your card {{maskedCard}} will expire on {{expiryDate}}. Please renew it before expiry.

subject: Card Blocked for Security Reasons
message: Dear {{customerName}}, your card {{maskedCard}} has been blocked due to suspicious activity. Please contact support if unauthorized.

subject: Loan Payment Due Reminder
message: Dear {{customerName}}, your EMI of ₹{{amount}} is due on {{dueDate}} for loan {{loanId}}.

subject: Loan Disbursed Successfully
message: Dear {{customerName}}, your loan of ₹{{amount}} has been successfully disbursed to your account {{accountNumber}}.
